snippet: Harold Holzer, the Metropolitan Museum of Art's senior vice president for external affairs, will "modify some of his responsibilities'' and cease overseeing external and internal communications, marketing and visitor services, according to an e-mail...
abstract: Harold Holzer, the Metropolitan Museum of Art's senior vice president for external affairs, will "modify some of his responsibilities'' and cease overseeing external and internal communications, marketing and visitor services, according to an e-mail sent to museum staff members on Monday by Thomas P. Campbell, the Met's director, and Emily K. Rafferty, its president.

headline.main: Harold Holzer to Curtail Duties at the Met Museum
